Cyber Security Roadmap[Demystyfying Bugs]

Hello, Welcome to another of my blog post, This blog post contains a detailed roadmap i followed while learning Cybersecurity(Websecurity)

My Cyber Security Roadmap!


[Fundamental IT Skills]

-Basic Computer Skills
-Basics of Computer Networking
-Computer Hardware Components

[Fundamental IT Skills]

-OSI Models
-Network Topologies
-Common Protocols and their uses
-Common Ports and their uses
-IPv4 and IPv6
-Basics of Subnetting

[Security Skills & Knowledge]

-CIA Triad
-Cyberattacks and Cybercrimes
-Cryptography
-Understanding Common Standards
-Kali Linux, ParrotOS etc.

[Hands on Skills]

-Knowledge on Common Virtualization Technologies(VMWare, VirtualBox)
-VUlnerable Labs(Portswigger Academy, Prompt.ml, YesweHack-DOjo, BruteLogic etc.)
-Tools to master(Nmap, Burpsuite, Wireshark, Metasploit, WHOIS etc.)

[Programmin Skills & Knowledge]

-Python
-Golang
-Javascript
-Bash

[Never Stop Learning]

-Go out in the real world and Start putting your skills into real world Scenerio Practice
